==============
Adding filters
==============

:doc:`Filters </programming/data/filters>`
are used to select records from a database table by specified criteria.
Click on the 
:doc:`Filters </admin/items/filters_dialog>`
button. 

.. image:: /intro/_images/tasks_filters.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Tasks filters dialog

In the dialog that will be displayed click on the **New** button and 
fill in the following form:

.. image:: /intro/_images/tasks_new_filter.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Tasks new filter
